room_title: Escape room "The Magnolia Mystery" by Deadbolt Escape Rooms in Tupelo
room_address: 1186 Cliff Gookin Blvd Suite B Tupelo, MS 38801
room_description:
Local millionaire and Tupelo resident, Archibald Graham, spent most of his life building his fortune in the state he loves and has called home for the last seventy years. Now, he is offering up a huge chunk of his fortune to anyone who can solve a mystery that he created for those who love Mississippi as much as he does.
Treasure seekers have been frantically trying to crack the series of clues he left behind and locate a cache of money worth over a million dollars. You and your group have decided to enter the hunt as well and see if you can uncover what so many others have not. Examine Grahamâ€™s Mississippi-influenced study, follow the trail of clues he left behind, and see if you can solve The Magnolia Mystery before someone else claims the treasure for themselves.
